message.empty: There is no user with this account type

message.deactivated_login: Account not confirmed yet. Please check your e-mail or request again confirmation link below.

email.check: We've sent a confirmation link, please check your e-mail to use this service.
email.no_account: There is no account registred with this e-mail.
email.automatic: This is an automatic e-mail. Not the answer
email.public_1: This e-mail was sent because we received a registration request in our system

email.public_3: If you did not request registration in our system, please contact us at
email.internal_1: This e-mail was sent because you were registred in our system by administration
email.internal_4: Please keep this e-mail for future checking
email.check_forgot: We've sent instructions to reset your password, please check your e-mail.
email.forgot_1: This e-mail was sent because we received a reset password request in our system

email.forgot_3: If you did not request password reset, please contact us at
